errors.error_description: The python dependencies are installed using `pip` before the virtual environment is created, which will install them globally instead of in the isolated environment.
correction_candidates: Move the `pip install -r requirements.txt` command to be after the `source venv/activate` command.
Add the `--user` flag to the pip command: `pip install --user -r requirements.txt`.
Remove the virtual environment creation steps and install dependencies globally.
Run `python3 -m pip install -r requirements.txt` instead of `pip install -r requirements.txt`.
errors.golden_answer: Move the `pip install -r requirements.txt` command to be after the `source venv/activate` command.
